Healthy Heart Program

Whether you have recently undergone a cardiac procedure or are seeking to reduce your cardiovascular risk, the Healthy Heart Program focuses on prevention, education, and lifestyle management.

This program is overseen by Dr. Sina Alipour, a cardiologist who works at multiple Fraser Health hospitals, including Burnaby Hospital, Royal Columbian Hospital, and Surrey Memorial Hospital.

What to Expect

  • You will be called in by a technologist, who will conduct either an electrocardiogram (ECG) or an exercise stress test.
    • This is to assess your current heart health, fitness level, and physical limitations.
  • Following the test, you will meet with Dr. Alipour, who will review your results and determine your eligibility for the program.
